util

类 PasswordAuthentication

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.PasswordAuthentication

  • public final class PasswordAuthentication
extends java.lang.Object
    Hash passwords for storage, and test passwords against password tokens. Instances of this class can be used concurrently by multiple threads.
    作者:
    erickson
    另请参阅:
    StackOverflow

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int DEFAULT_COST
      The minimum recommended cost, used by default
      static java.lang.String ID
      Each token produced by this class uses this identifier as a prefix.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PasswordAuthentication() 
      PasswordAuthentication(int cost)
      Create a password manager with a specified cost

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean authenticate(char[] password, java.lang.String token)
      Authenticate with a password and a stored password token.
      java.lang.String hash(char[] password)
      Hash a password for storage.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • PasswordAuthentication

        public PasswordAuthentication()

      • PasswordAuthentication

        public PasswordAuthentication(int cost)
        Create a password manager with a specified cost
        参数:
        cost - the exponential computational cost of hashing a password, 0 to 30

    • 方法详细资料

      • hash

        public java.lang.String hash(char[] password)
        Hash a password for storage.
        参数:
        password - the password to hash
        返回:
        a secure authentication token to be stored for later authentication

      • authenticate

        public boolean authenticate(char[] password,
                            java.lang.String token)
        Authenticate with a password and a stored password token.
        参数:
        password - the password to check
        token - the hashed password
        返回:
        true if the password and token match
